section.simpara: Sets AMA-Flags in the Call Detail Record (CDR).

Sets AMA (Automatic Message Accounting)
In North America, Automatic Message Accounting has been used for billing in Direct Distance Dialing since it was introduced in the mid-20th century. The system was originally used to provide the toll system with information about the originating circuit so that the subscriber could be billed for a long distance call. flags in the CDR. Overrides any settings found in channel configuration files. Valid settings are default, omit, billing and documentation.
